title: Blended Training Program Based on the DECODE Model for STEM Teachers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM Education Theory and Subject Matter Knowledge
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service/in-service teachers to develop integrated competencies in technology, subject matter, and pedagogical methods within a virtual reality environment. Includes provision of digital devices and application of project-based assessment.

learning_goals: By utilizing the three stages of the DECODE model (demonstration → collaborative design/instruction → reflection), learners can design VR-based STEM lessons with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop instructional materials integrating Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPACK) using simulation tools and revise them at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners can design and apply at least three types of interactive activities to enhance engagement in VR environments to actual lessons.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
